result.eng: I have to go to the bank.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé dul go dtí an banc
result.orig: Caithfidh mé dul go dtí an banc
result.html: Caithfidh mé dul go dtí an bancI have to go to the bank.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé dul go dtí an bancI have to go to the bank.

result.eng: There are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha

result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna den ċéad scoṫ ann Tá siopaí maiṫe ann oifig an ṗoist scoileanna banc agus linn snáṁaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
